12 Pun ewe ranin ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas epwe mwitir feito won muu meinisin, ewer, won ew me ew; ewer, won ewe mi namanam tekia me eingeing, me won emon me emon ewe a sikasini, iwe i epwe tipetekison.

13 Ewer, iwe ewe ranin ewe Samon epwe feito won meinisin ekkewe ira cedar non Lebanon, pun ra tekia me sikasini; me won meinisin ekkewe ira oak non Bashan;

14 Me won meinisin ekkewe chuk mi tekia, me won meinisin ekkewe chukuchukuta, me won meinisin ekkewe muu minne ra sikasini, me won aramas meinisin;

15 Me won meinisin tower mi tekia, me won meinisin ekkewe etip mi tit;

16 Me won meinisin ekkewe sipwen ewe sat, me won meinisin ekkewe sipwen Tarses, me won meinisin ningochun met kewe mi pwano.

17 Iwe ewe eingeingen aramas epwe chappetiw, iwe ewe sikesiken aramas epwe tipetekison; iwe ewe Samon chok epwe tekia non ena ran.

18 Iwe ekkewe niosun anu muan i epwe unusen awesireno.

19 Iwe repwe feino ngeni ekkewe pwangen ekkewe fau, me non ekkewe pokungon ewe puun, pokiten nuokusun ewe Samon epwe feito wor me ewe ningen an ning mi napanap epwe wichir, nupwen a poputa ne uchikingawei ewe puun.

20 Non ena ran emon aramas epwe poutano noun kewe niosun anu muan mi silver, me noun kewe niosun anu muan mi gold, minne i a fen fori fan pwisin itan an epwe fen ngeni ir, ngeni ekkewe mole me ngeni ekkewe poute;

21 Ren feinon non ekkewe ngaten ekkewe fau, me won ekkewe unungen ekkewe fau mi ken, pokiten nuokusun ewe Samon epwe feito wor me ewe ningen an ning mi napanap epwe wichir, nupwen a poputa ne uchikingawei ewe puun.

22 Kouno ami ne apinukunuk non aramas, minne ngasangasan a nom non pwangen potun; pun met namotan an emon epwe aucheani i?
2-ne 13:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 13[/font_size][/center]

[i]Judah me Jerusalem repwe angei niwinir pokiten ar aneasonap—Ewe Samon a tingor fan iten me a apungu Noun kewe aramas—Ekkewe fopun seni Zion ra anumamau me ariaffou pokiten ar sani ekkewe mettochun fonufan—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 3. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Pun nengeni, ewe Samon, ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, a angeiano seni Jerusalem, me seni Judah, ewe nongonong me apinukunuk, unusen ewe apinukunukun pinewa, me unusen ewe nongonongen konik—

2 Ewe mwan mi napanap, me ewe mwanin maun, ewe sou apung, me ewe soufos, me ewe mi tipachem, me ewe chon nom;

3 Ewe kaptinin nime, me ewe mwan mi sufon, me ewe chon aninis, me ewe chon fana mettoch mi angoch, me ewe sou kapas mi sinenap.

4 Iwe upwe ngeni ir semirit pwe repwe nour kewe prince, me monukon repwe nemenem wor.

5 Iwe ekkewe aramas repwe riaffou, emon me emon meinisin seni pwan emon, iwe emon me emon seni chon orun; ewe semirit epwe anapanapa inisin non namanam tekia ngeni ewe chon nom, iwe ewe ngaw ngeni ewe mi sufon.

6 Nupwen emon mwan epwe kamwochuno pwin we me non imwen seman we, me epwe apasa: En a wor ufom, kopwe nöum chon nemenem, iwe kosap mut ngeni ei tatakis epwe feito fan poum—

7 Non ena ran i epwe akkapon, epwe apasa: Usap emon chon echikar; pun non imwei ese wor pinewa ika uf; kosap foriei ai upwe emon chon nemenemen ekkewe aramas.

8 Pun Jerusalem a tano, me Judah a turutiw, pokiten channawer me ar kewe foffor ra ungeni ewe Samon, ra asonga ekkewe mesen an ning.

9 Ewe nikinikin mesemeser a pwarata usur, me a affatano ar tipis pwe ra usun chok Sodom, iwe rese tongeni opano. Riaffou ngeni ngunur, pun ra niwini ngeni pwisin ir met mi ngaw!

10 Apasa ngeni ekkewe mi tupwon pwe mi öch rer; pun repwe mwongo ewe foun iran ar kewe foffor.

11 Riaffou ngeni ekkewe mi ngaw, pun repwe mano non pekin ngun; pun niwinin pour kewe epwe nonnom wor!

12 Iwe nei aramas, semirit ra nour chon ariaffou, iwe fefin ra wisen nemenem wor. O nei aramas, ir ekkewe ra nemeni kemi ra echimwakemi pwe oupwe mwanino me atai wenewenen ami kewe aan.

13 Ewe Samon a uta pwe epwe tingor, me a foffor pwe epwe apungu ekkewe aramas.

14 Ewe Samon epwe poputa ne kapung fiti ekkewe chon nom seni noun kewe aramas me ekkewe prince seni ikewe; pun oua fen anieno ewe ataken kreip me angeiano ren pochokun pisekin ekkewe mi woungaw non imwemi kewe.

15 Met oua mochen? Oua opuni nei aramas ngeni tatakisitiw, me wusi mesen ekkewe mi woungaw, anon ewe Samon Koten Mwicheich.

16 Soposopono, ewe Samon a apasa: Pokiten ekkewe fopun seni Zion ra sikesik, me fetan fiti awuunen uwer me sikepwachen meser, fetan me nuenuen fetan nupwen ra feino, me fori ew tikitik ren pecher—

17 Iei minne ewe Samon epwe wichir ren ew karakar ne mokuren ekkewe fopun seni Zion, iwe ewe Samon epwe pwarano pekin inisir kewe mi mwonono.

18 Non ena ran ewe Samon epwe angeiano ningen nour ekkewe tikitikin fouten inis, me pwonupwonun mokur, me ekkewe foukukumosun fouten inis usun napanapen ewe maram;

19 Ekkewe senimecha me ekkewe naana, me ekkewe mangakun mokur;

20 Ekkewe akkaw, me ekkewe fouten peche, me ekkewe fofon chamwer, me ekkewe porun nee, me ekkewe iering;

21 Ekkewe ring, me ekkewe enningen pwot;

22 Ekkewe uf mi uf nikkesiwin, me ekkewe pinu, me ekkewe pwonupwonun mokur, me ekkewe arurun mokur;

23 Ekkewe kinassin ourir, me ekkewe mangaku mi pwetete, ekkewe pwonupwonun mokur, me ekkewe nikatupon.

24 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito, me nukun pongarangar epwe wor pongaw; iwe me nukun echo noponopa, echo kamwekis; iwe me nukun nikinikochun kokkotun mokur, panneno; iwe me nukun echo fouten neup, echo pwonupwonun mangakun netipeta; kar me nukun nioch.

25 Noum kewe mwan repwe turutiw me ren ewe ketinas me noum kewe mi pochokun non ewe maun.

26 Iwe an kewe tit repwe noninen me netipeta; iwe epwe ponnuno, me epwe mwot won ewe puun.
2-ne 14:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 14[/font_size][/center]

[i]Zion me noun kewe fopun repwe ngaseno me nimenimoch non ewe ranin menenium—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 4. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe non ena ran, fumon fefin repwe kamwochuno emon mwan, repwe apasa: Am aupwe ani pwisin anem pinewa, me ufouf pwisin ufem; nge mut ngenikem am aupwe eiteit ngeni itom pwe epwe awesano am assaw.

2 Non ena ran ewe panen ewe Samon epwene ningoch me amwarar; foun iran ewe puun epwe echipwer me ning ngeni ir ekkewe ra tiweno seni Israel.

3 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito, ir ekkewe ra nometiw non Zion me nonnom non Jerusalem repwe fel, emon me emon a mak me nein ekkewe mi manau non Jerusalem—

4 Nupwen ewe Samon epwe tonueno nimengawen ekkewe fopun seni Zion, me epwe enimochuono chan Jerusalem seni nukanapan we me ren ewe ngunun kapung me pwan ren ewe ngunun kar.

5 Iwe ewe Samon epwe forata won meinisin nenien nonnom non chukun Zion, me won an kewe mwicheichen aramas, ew kuchu me otuot fansoun ran me ewe saramen ew ekkei mi ngetenget fansoun pwin; pun won ningen Zion meinisin epwe ew eppet.

6 Iwe epwe wor ew imw pwe epwe ew chuno non fansoun ran seni ewe pwichikar, me epwe ew nenien tumun, me ew nenien asoso seni monumon me seni pungun ran.
2-ne 15:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 15[/font_size][/center]

[i]An ewe Samon we ataken kreip (Israel) epwe ponnuno, iwe Noun kewe aramas repwe toropas fetan—Riaffou epwe feito wor non ar nikinikin amam ennet me toropas fetan—Ewe Samon epwe eitieta ew esisin me ioni Israel—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 5. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe mwirin upwe konu ngeni nei mi unusen achengicheng echo kön usun nei achengicheng, usun an we ataken kreip. A wor an nei mi unusen achengicheng atake non ew chukuchukuta mi uwaoch.

2 Iwe a tittieno, me ionau ekkewe faun ikewe, me fotuki ren ewe iran kreip mi fokkun murino, me fori ew tower nukanapan we, me pwan fori ew mwesinen ungungun kreip non; iwe a esuku pwe epwe uwani foun kreip, iwe a uwani foun kreip mi mwacho.

3 Iwe iei, O aramasen Jerusalem, me mwanin Judah, finata, ouse mochen, nefinen ngang me ai we ataken kreip.

4 Met ita epwe pwan tongeni for ngeni ai we ataken kreip minne use mwo fen fori me non? Ina minne, nupwen ua esuku pwe ita epwe uwani foun kreip a uwani foun kreip mi mwacho.

5 Iwe iei non ei fansoun; upwe erenuk met upwe fori ngeni ai we ataken kreip—upwe angeiano tittin we mi for seni ira, iwe man repwe anieno; iwe upwe ataietiw tittin we, iwe epwe chapapetiw;

6 Iwe upwe ataieno; esap chiwen fich ika tuu; nge epwene marita ekkewe petewen mi fonufon me ira fonufon; upwe pwan annuku ngeni ekkewe kuchu pwe resap chiwen apungatiw pungun ran me won.

7 Pun ewe ataken kreip an ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas ina ewe imwen Israel, iwe ekkewe mwanin Judah ina fatan ira mi menemenoch; iwe a esuku kapung, iwe nengeni, riaffou; a esuku wenechar, nge nengeni, ew pupuchor.

8 Riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra apachafengeni imw ngeni imw, tori an esap chiwen wor neni, pwe repwe tongeni anenier anamon chok non nukanapan fonufan!

9 Non seningei, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, ennet chommong imw repwe ponnuno, iwe esap wor aramasen non ekkewe teninimw mi napanap me ningoch.

10 Ewer, engon acre seni ewe ataken kreip epwe awora ew bath, iwe masowen foun iran ew homer epwe awora ew ephah.

11 Riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra pwaata kai fansoun nesossor, pwe repwe kutta sakaw, ekkewe ra soposopono tori nepwin, iwe wain a asakawereno!

12 Iwe ewe harp, me ewe viol, ewe tabret, me pipe, me wain ikkena mi nom non ar kametip; nge rese aucheani ewe angangen ewe Samon, rese pwan ekieki forien poun kewe.

13 Iei minne, nei kewe aramas ra feino ngeni fotek, pokiten ese wor ar weweoch; iwe nour kewe mwan mi sufon ra echik, iwe nour kewe mwicheichen aramas ra pwaseno ren kaka.

14 Iei minne, hell a pwisin awatteno, me sukano awan ese wor kaukun; me ar ning, me nour mwicheichen aramas, me ar ning, iwe ion ewe a pwapwa, epwe feitiw non.

15 Iwe ewe aramas mi kichiniwen epwe turutiw, iwe ewe aramas mi napanap epwe tipetekison, iwe mesen ewe mi eingeing epwe tipetekison.

16 Nge ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas epwe tekia non kapung, iwe Kot ewe mi fel epwe enimenimochuno non wenechar.

17 Iwe ekkewe appanen siip repwe mwongo non pwisin napanaper, iwe chon ekis repwe anieno ekkewe neni mi tano nenien ekkewe siip mi kefinita.

18 Riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra nukei angangangaw ren ekkewe fofon namotongaw, me tipis usun ita ew senin kuruma;

19 Ekkewe ra apasa: Fori an epwe mwitir, amwitiri an angang, pwe sipwe tongeni kuna; iwe fori ewe chon aurouren ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel epwe mareto me feito, pwe sipwe sinei.

20 Riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra eita ngaw ngeni och, me öch ngeni ngaw, ekkewe ra siwini rochopwak ren saram, me saram ren rochopwak, ekkewe ra siwini kipwin ren ngarangar, me ngarangar ren kipwin!

21 Riaffou ngeni ekkewe mi mirit me non pwisin meser me tipachem me non pwisin kunaer!

22 Riaffou ngeni ekkewe mi napanap ne un wain, me ekkewe mwan mi pochokun ne nofiti sakaw;

23 Ion a epichi ekkewe aramas mi ngaw fan iten niwinin, me angeiano wenecharen ewe mi tupwon seni i!

24 Iei minne, usun ewe ekkei a kenieno ekkewe ira mi pwas, iwe ewe ngetenget a atano ewe unuchen foun ira, warer kewe repwe ngaweno, iwe uwar kewe repwe aasino usun toputop; pokiten ra aturano ewe annuk an ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, me ponnuku ewe kapasen ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel.

25 Iei minne, ina ewe songen ewe Samon a poputa ngeni noun kewe aramas, iwe a eitieno poun ngeni ir, iwe a wichi ir; iwe ekkewe chukuchukuta ra chechech, iwe inisir kewe mi mano ra kamwefesen me non nukanapen ekkewe aan. Pun inamo iei an we song esap kunnuno, nge poun epwe chok aitieu.

26 Iwe epwe aueta ew esisin ngeni ekkewe muu seni towaw, iwe epwe eisis ngeni ir seni nesopun ewe fonufan; iwe nengeni, repwe mwitir ne feito; esap wor emon epwe pekus ika turuno me neir.

27 Esap wor emon epwe mouruno ika annut; ika achawaren nukanaper resap pwan nikapwesepwes, ika fofon nour kewe sus resap pwan tano;

28 Ion nour foun nikappich mi ken, me meinisin nour kewe nikappich ra monneta, me apachapachen nour kewe oris repwe usun napanapen foun fau, me ar kewe taia repwe usun ew ewuniar, ar weruwer usun emon naion.

29 Repwe weruwer usun ekkewe kukkun naion; ewer, repwe weruwer, me kamwochuno ewe mi ono, me repwe uweiano non tumunoch, iwe esap wor emon epwe angasereno.

30 Iwe non ena ran repwe weruwer ngeni ir usun weruwerun ewe sat; iwe ika repwe nengeni ewe fonu, nengeni, rochopwak me netipengaw, iwe ewe saram a rochono non ekkewe nang ikewe.
2-ne 16:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 16[/font_size][/center]

[i]Isaiah a kuna ewe Samon—An Isaiah kewe tipis ra museno—A kokko pwe epwe osini—A osini usun ketiwengawen an Kraist kewe afanafan me ren ekkewe chon Jew—Ew nussun mwicheich epwe niwinsefan—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 6. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Non ewe ier nupwen king Uzziah a mano, ua pwan kuna ewe Samon a mwommot won ew nenien mwottun king, tekia me kekita, iwe urosun ufan we a aurano ewe tempel.

2 Asetan a uta ekkewe seraphim; emon me emon a wor wonofoch pour; ren ruofoch poun i a pwonuono mesan, me ren ruofoch poun i a pwonuono pechen, me ren ruofoch i a fen chang.

3 Iwe emon a puchor ngeni ewe pwan emon, me a apasa: Fel, fel, fel, ina ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas; unusen fonufan a ureno ren an ning.

4 Iwe ekkewe nongonongen ewe asam ra mwokut pokiten mongungun i ewe a puchor, iwe ewe imw a ureno ren otuot.

5 Mwirin ua apasa: Riaffou a fis ngeniei! pun ua kiteter; pokiten ngang emon mwan mi nimengaw tunnawei; iwe ua nonnom nein ew aramas mi nimengaw tunnawer; pun mesei a fen kuna ewe King, ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas.

6 Mwirin emon me nein ekkewe seraphim a aasito rei, a wor ew moochen ekkei mi char non poun, minne i a angei me ren ruofoch achipw seni ewe nenien kek asor;

7 Iwe a wata won awei, me a apasa: Nengeni, ei a fen attapa tunnawom; iwe om angangangaw a musono, iwe tipisum a nimochuno.

8 Ua pwan rongorong mongungun ewe Samon, a apasa: Ion upwe tinano, me ion epwe feino fan itach? Mwirin ua apasa: Ngang iei; tinieino.

9 Iwe a apasa: Feino me ereni ekkei aramas—Oupwe ennetin rongorong, nge rese weweiti; me oupwe ennetin kuna, nge rese eteneki.

10 Fori netipen ekkei aramas ar resap memef, me fori seninger repwe pung, me achunnano meser—pwe resap kuna ren meser, me rongorong ren seninger, me weweiti ren netiper, me repwe kun seni mi ngaw me repwe chikar.

11 Mwirin ua apasa: Samon, ifa taman? Iwe a apasa: Tori an ekkewe teninimw repwe tano esap wor masower, me ekkewe imw esap wor aramas non, me ewe fonu epwe unusen ponnuno;

12 Iwe ewe Samon a fen asueno aramas towaw, pun epwe wor ew angangen nikitano mi watte nukanapen ewe fonu.

13 Nge epwe chok wor ew ne engonun, iwe repwe niwinsefan, me repwe anieno, usun efoch ira teil, me usun efoch oak ewe auchean kinikinin mi nom non ir nupwen ra amoratiw cheer kewe; pwe mwirimwirin we mi fel epwe ina auchean kinikinin we.
2-ne 17:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 17[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ephraim me Syria ra maun ngeni Judah—Kraist epwe uputiw seni emon fopun nimenimoch—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 7. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe non ewe fansoun non ekkewe ranin Ahaz ewe noun Jotham, ewe noun Uzziah, kingen Judah, pwe Rezin, kingen Syria, me Pekah ewe noun Remaliah, kingen Israel, a feita ngeni Jerusalem pwe epwe maun ngeni, nge ese tongeni okkufu.

2 Iwe a fateno ngeni imwen David, a apasa: Syria a chungeni Ephraim. Iwe netipan a mwokut, me netipen noun kewe aramas, usun ekkewe iran nein petewen ra mwokut ren ewe asepwan.

3 Mwirin ewe Samon a apasa ngeni Isaiah: Feino iei pwe kopwe churi Ahaz, en me Shearjashub noum we anuon, non nesopun aanen ewe asan warawar non ewe aanenapen ewe masies an ewe chon for mangaku;

4 Iwe apasa ngeni i: Kopwe tumunuoch, me kopwe fanafaneno; kosap nuokus, kosap pwan noninen pun ekkewe ruofoch ukun amuch mi otuot, pun ewe song mi pochokun an Rezin ngeni Syria, me an noun Remaliah.

5 Pokiten Syria, Ephraim, me ewe noun Remaliah, ra fen akkota aurour mi ngaw ngonuk, ra apasa:

6 Sipwene feita ungeni Judah me eriaffou, me sipwe atai pwe sipwe tonong, me awiisa emon king nukanapan, ewer, ewe noun Tabeal.

7 Iei anon ewe Samon Kot: Esap uta, esap pwan fisino.

8 Pun ewe mokurenapen teninimwen Syria ina Damascus, me ewe mokurenapen teninimwen Damascus, Rezin; iwe me mwen wone me nimu ier Ephraim epwe morono pwe esap chiwen ew mwicheichen aramas.

9 Iwe ewe mokurenapen teninimwen Ephraim ina Samaria, me ewe mokurenapen Samaria ina noun Remaliah we anuon. Ika ousap nuku iwe ennet ousap tumun.

10 Soposopono, ewe Samon a pwan kapas ngeni Ahaz, a apasa:

11 Kopwe tingorei ewe Samon om Kot ew esisin; kopwe tingorei ew esisinen seni anonnonun fonufan, ika seni asan non nang.

12 Nge Ahaz a apasa: Usap tingor, usap pwan sotuni ewe Samon.

13 Iwe a apasa: Kopwe rongorong iei, O imwen David; a ew mettoch mi kukkun ren om kopwe apekusu aramas, nge oupwe pwan apekusu ai Kot?

14 Iei minne, ewe Samon pwisin epwe ngonuk ew esisin—Nengeni, emon fopun nimenimoch epwe pwopwo, me epwe nounatiw emon at, me epwe eita ngeni Immanuel.

15 Pwetö me punech i epwe mwongo, pwe i epwe sinei an esap etiwa ewe mi ngaw me epwe finata ewe mi och.

16 Pun me mwen ewe monukon epwe sinei an esap etiwa ewe mi ngaw me finata ewe mi och, ewe fonu ka oput epwe monnukuno seni ir me ruomon noun kewe king.

17 Ewe Samon epwe forata wom, me won noum kewe aramas, me won imwen semom we, ekkewe ran rese mwo feito seni ewe ran nupwen Ephraim a suno seni Judah, ewe kingen Assyria.

18 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe non ewe ran pwe nupwen Samon epwe eisis pwe epwe kokkori ewe noong a nom non ewe towawenon kinikinin Egypt, me kokkori ewe sisata ewe a nom non ewe fonuen Assyria.

19 Iwe repwe feito, me ir meinisin repwe nom non ekkewe nemonun chuk mi ponnuno, me non ekkewe pwangen ekkewe fau, me won ira fonufon meinisin, me won petewen meinisin.

20 Non ewe pwan chok ran ewe Samon epwe raisew ren efoch raiso mi kamo, me ren ir ekkewe pekinon ewe chonupupu, me ren ewe kingen Assyria, ewe mokur, me ewe unounen ekkewe peche; iwe epwe pwan raisew ewe enis.

21 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe non ena ran, emon mwan epwe tumunu emon appanen kou me ruomon siip;

22 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe, pokiten mi wor chommongun minik i epwe mwongo pwetö; pun meinisin ekkewe ra nometiw non ewe fonu repwe mwongo pwetö me punech.

23 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe non ena ran, ew me ew neni epwe fis, ikewe mi wor ew ngerou ira kreip ren ew ngerou foun silver, epwe winiti petewen mi fonufon me ira fonufon.

24 Mwan repwe feito ngeni ena neni fiti foun nikappich me nikappich, pokiten unusen ewe fonu epwe winiti petewen fonufon me ira fonufon.

25 Iwe ekkewe chukuchukuta meinisin repwe tuuta ren ewe mechan tuu puun, esap feito ikewe ewe nuokusun petewen fonufon me ira fonufon; nge epwe winiti nenien titinon oksen, me puratiwen appanen siip me sike.
2-ne 18:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 18[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kraist epwe efou foun chepetek me efou foun efeiengaw—Kutta ewe Samon, nge esap ekkewe sou roong mi tik neuwer—Sapengeni ewe annuk me ngeni ewe kapasen pwarata ren emmwen—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 8. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Soposopono, ewe kapas an ewe Samon a kapas ngeniei: Angei ngonuk ewe nenien mak mi watte, me makkei non me ren efoch pen noun aramas, usun Maher-shalal-hash-baz.

2 Iwe ua angei ngeniei ekkoch chon pwarata mi nukuchar pwe repwe makkei, Uriah ewe pris, me Zechariah ewe noun Jeberechiah.

3 Iwe ua feino ngeni ewe fefin soufos; iwe a pwopwo me nounatiw emon at. Mwirin ewe Samon a apasa ngeniei: Eita ngeni, Maher-shalal-hash-baz.

4 Pun nengeni, ewe semirit esap sinei an epwe puchor, Semei, me inei, me mwen ekkewe pisekisekin Damascus me ewe niapen maun an Samaria epwe kekino me mwen ewe kingen Assyria.

5 Ewe Samon a pwan kapas ngeniei sefan, a apasa:

6 Pokiten ekkei aramas rese etiwa ekkewe konikin Shiloah minne ra pupu non pwetete, me ra pwapwa non Rezin me noun Remaliah anuon;

7 Iei minne, nengeni, ewe Samon a wata wor ekkewe konikin ewe chonupupu, mi pochokun me chommong, pwan mwo ewe kingen Assyria me unusen an ning; iwe i epwe feita won unusen an kewe epin chonupupu, me ureno seni an kewe nepekin chonupupu.

8 Iwe i epwe feino nukanapen Judah; i epwe ureno me epwe nuseni, i epwe mwo pwan feita tori ewe wuu; me meresinon poun kewe repwe aurano unusen fonuom we, O Immanuel.

9 Achiechia fengenikemi, O ami aramas, iwe oupwe tatakisitiw; me oupwe ausening ami meinisin seni ekkewe fonu mi towaw; finitano nukanapemi, iwe oupwe tatakisitiw; finitano nukanapemi, iwe oupwe tatakisitiw.

10 Kokkot fengen, iwe epwe namotongaw; apasa ewe porous, iwe esap fis; pun Kot a nom rech.

11 Pun ewe Samon a kapas ngeniei ren efoch pau mi pochokun, me a aurouraei pwe usap fetan non ewe napanapen ekkei aramas, a apasa:

12 Ousap apasano, Ew tipeewfengen, ngeni meinisin ion ekkei aramas repwe apasa, Ew tipeewfengen; ousap pwan nuokusiti ar nuokus, ousap pwan noninen.

13 Sufonuti pwisin ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, iwe mut ngeni i epwe ami nuokus, me mut ngeni i epwe ami aurek.

14 Iwe i epwe winiti ew nenien tumun; nge epwe efou foun chepetek, me epwe efou foun efeiengaw ngeni ir me ru ekkewe imwen Israel, epwe ew minne niap me ew sar ngeni ekkewe aramasen Jerusalem.

15 Iwe chommong me neir repwe turuno me turutiw, me repwe tatakis, me repwe tup non sar, me repwe ono.

16 Fotano ewe kapasen pwarata, me eppungano ewe annuk me nein nei kewe chon kaeo.

17 Iwe upwe apinukunuku ewe Samon, ewe a opano mesan seni ewe imwen Jacob, iwe upwe kutta i.

18 Nengeni, ngang me ekkewe semirit minne ewe Samon a ngeniei pwe repwe esisin me repwe mettoch mi amwarar non Israel seni ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, ewe a nonnom non ewe Chukun Zion.

19 Iwe nupwen repwe apasa ngonuk: Kutta seni ir ekkewe ra chiechi ngeni sou-wananu, me seni ekkewe sou roong ekkewe mi tik neuwer me mongunungun—aramas resap kutta seni ar Kot fan iten ekkewe mi manau ar repwe rongorong seni ekkewe mi mano?

20 Kutta seni ewe annuk me seni ewe kapasen pwarata; iwe ika rese kapas anongonong won ei kapas, iwe epwe pokiten ese wor saram non ir.

21 Iwe repwe feino nukanapan we ren riaffou mi weires me echik; iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe nupwen repwe echik, repwe pwisin mangaw, me otteki nour king me ar Kot, me repwe neta asan.

22 Iwe repwe nengeni ewe puun me kuna fitikoko, me rochopwak, kirochen riaffou, iwe repwe suno ngeni rochopwak.
2-ne 19:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 19[/font_size][/center]

[i]Isaiah a kapas fan iten ewe Messiah—Ekkewe aramas non rochopwak repwe kuna ew saram mi pochokun—Ngenikich emon semirit epwe uputiw—I epwe ewe Princen Kinamwe me epwe nemenem won an David we nenien mwottun king—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 9. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Nge inamo, ewe kiroch esap usun met mi fis non an we osukosuk, nupwen akkom i epwe ekis eriaffou ewe fonuen Zebulun, me ewe founen Naphtali, iwe mwirinon epwe fori ekkoch riaffou mi rochongaw a weneno ren ewe aanen ewe Setipar pekinon Jordan non Galilee seni ekkewe muu.

2 Ekkewe aramas ra fen fetan non rochopwak ra kuna ew saram mi pochokun; ir ekkewe ra nom non ewe fonuen ewe chumonnun mano, ewe saram a tinetiw wor.

3 Ka fen achommongano masowen ewe muu, me anapano ewe pwapwa—ra pwapwa me mwom anongonong won ewe pwapwan kinikin uwa, iwe usun mwan ra pwapwa nupwen ra ineti ekkewe niapen maun.

4 Pun ka fen ataieno osan achoun we, me ewe iran afaran, ewe wokun an chon ariaffou.

5 Pun meinisin maun an ewe sounfiu a fis ren osukosuken akurang, iwe ekkewe uf ra fokkun cha; nge ei epwe fis ren kar me kakun ekkei.

6 Pun ngenikich emon semirit a uputiw, ngenikich emon at a kawor; iwe ewe government epwe nonnom won afaran; iwe itan epwe iteni, Amwarar, Chon Aninis, Ewe Kot mi Napanap, Ewe Sam Esemuch, Ewe Princen Kinamwe.

7 Ren ewe napenon government me kinamwe esap wor soponon, won ewe nenien mwottun king an David, me won muun we pwe epwe oota, me epwe forano ren kapung me ren pungoch seni ei fansoun feino, pwan mwo feinfeino. Ewe pochokunen memef an ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas epwe fori ei.

8 Ewe Samon a tinano an kapas ngeni Jacob iwe a asaramano won Israel.

9 Iwe ekkewe aramas meinisin repwe sinei, pwan mwo Ephraim me ekkewe aramasen Samaria, ekkewe ra ekiek non namanam tekia me pochokunen netip:

10 Ekkewe foun simen ra turutiw, nge sipwe aueta ren fau mi fanafan; ekkewe sycamore ra pokupokutiw nge sipwe siwini ir ngeni ira cedar.

11 Iei minne ewe Samon epwe forata ekkewe chon koum an Rezin repwe ungeni i, me repwe achufengeni noun kewe chon koum;

12 Ekkewe chon Syria akkom me ekkewe chon Philistia mwirin; iwe repwe ataieno Israel ren awer mi sukuno. Pun inamo iei an we song esap kunnuno, nge poun a chok aitieu.

13 Pun ekkewe aramas rese kunngeni i ewe a wichi ir, rese pwan kutta aninis me ren ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas.

14 Iei minne ewe Samon epwe pokueno seni Israel mokuran me ukun, panan me fetin non ew ran.

15 Ewe chon nom, i mokuran; iwe ewe soufos a afanafana chofona, i ewe ukun.

16 Pun ekkewe sou emmwenin ekkei aramas ra fori ir pwe repwe mwanino; iwe ekkewe ra angei emmwen seni ir repwe mano.

17 Iei minne ewe Samon esap wor an pwapwa non nour kewe kukkun anuon, esap pwan wor an umoumoch ngeni ekkewe ese wor semer me ekkewe fefin mi mano punuwer; pun emon me emon meinisin mi nikatuputup me chon fori mi ngaw, iwe meinisin aaw repwe apasa mettoch mi umwes. Pun inamo iei an we song esap kunnuno, nge poun a chok aitieu.

18 Pun fofforungaw epwe kar usun ewe ekkei; epwe kenieno ekkewe petewen mi fonufon me ira fonufon, iwe epwe aku ekkei non ekkewe wenuwenun ewe petewen, iwe repwe chukuchukuta usun ewe feitan otuot.

19 Seni ewe ningeringerin ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas ewe fonu a rochono, iwe ekkewe aramas repwene usun kakun ewe ekkei; esap wor emon aramas epwe umoumoch ngeni pwin.

20 Iwe i epwe turufi me won peniemwanin poun me epwe echik; iwe i epwe mwongo won ewe peniefefinin poun me esap menemenoch; emon me emon epwe pwisin ani futuken poun—

21 Manasseh, Ephraim; me Ephraim, Manasseh; ir fengen repwe ungeni Judah. Pun inamo iei an we song esap kunnuno, nge poun a chok aitieu.
2-ne 20:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 20[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewe kiteterinon Assyria a ew esisinen ewe kiteterinon ekkewe aramas mi ngaw atun ewe Aruwen Wareto—Fitemon chok aramas repwe chiwen manau mwirin ewe Samon epwe feito sefan—Ewe nussun Jacob epwe niwin non ena ran—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 10. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra annukano annuk ese wenechar, me ekkewe ra makkei porous ese pung minne ra fen forano;

2 Ren ar repwe eppeti seni ekkewe mi osupwang ar kapung, me ar repwe angeiano ekkewe pung seni ekkewe mi woungaw ne nein nei kewe aramas, pwe ekkewe fefin mi mano punuwer repwe ar niapen maun, me pwan repwe sona seni ekkewe ese wor semer.

3 Iwe met kopwe fori non ewe ranin efeiengaw, me non ewe tatakis minne epwe feito seni towaw? ngeni ion oupwe su ngeni ne angei aninis? me ian oupwe nikitatiw ami kewe pisekisek?

4 Me nukun ngang repwe chappetiw fan ekkewe ewe choun chon fotek, iwe repwe turutiw fan ekkewe mi ninnino. Pun inamo iei an we song esap kunnuno, nge poun a chok aitieu.

5 O chon Assyria, ewe pochokunen ai song, me ewe efoch wok non pour ina ar song mi pungoch.

6 Upwe tinano i epwe ungeni ew muu mi nikatuputup, me ungeni ekkewe aramasen ai ningeringer upwe ngeni i ew annuk pwe epwe angei ekkewe winnen maun, me epwe angei ekkewe niapen maun, me epwe puriretiw usun ewe pwakaken ekkewe aan.

7 Iwe nge i ese mochen epwe ina usun, netipan ese pwan mochen ewe sokkun, nge non netipan pwe epwe atano me pokueno ekkewe muu esap ekkoch chok.

8 Pun a apasa: Met esap nei kewe prince meinisin ir king?

9 Esap Calno usun Carchemish? Esap Hamath usun Arpad? Esap Samaria usun Damascus?

10 Iwe pokiten pei a forata ekkewe muun niosun anu muan, me noun kewe nios mi fanafan ra napeseni ir ekkewe seni Jerusalem me seni Samaria;

11 Ngang usap fori, usun ua fen fori ngeni Samaria me noun kewe niosun anu muan, upwe pwan fori ngeni Jerusalem me noun kewe niosun anu muan?

12 Ina minne ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe nupwen ewe Samon epwe fori unusen an angang won Chukun Zion me won Jerusalem, upwe ngeni niwinin uwan ewe netip mi pochokun an ewe kingen Assyria, me ewe ningen nikinikin mi tekia.

13 Pun i a apasa: Seni pochokunen pei me seni ai mirit ua fen fori ekkei mettoch; pun ngang mi tipachem; me ua fen amwokutu ekkewe kianin ekkewe aramas, me sonai ar pisek auchea, me ua fen okkufatiw ekkewe aramas usun emon mwan mi pwaracho;

14 Iwe pei a kuna usun ew faas ekkewe pisekisekin ekkewe aramas; me usun emon a ioifengeni ekkewe sokun ra nomwetiw ua fen ioifengeni unusen ewe fonufan; iwe ese wor emon a amwokutu ewe pau, ika suki ewe aw, ika tik neuwer.

15 Met ewe kouk epwe pwisin eingano i seni ewe a nouni i ne pokupok? Met ewe ngerenger epwe pwisin anapano i seni ewe a uchiki i? Usun ita ewe wok epwe pwisin uchiki seni ir ekkewe ra ekieta, ika usun ita ewe fochun ira epwe pwisin ekieta usun ita ese wor iran!

16 Iei minne pwe ewe Samon, ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, epwe tinano me nein noun kewe mi kefinita, osukosuk; me fan an ning i epwe aku ew kar usun ewe karen ew ekkei.

17 Iwe ewe saramen Israel epwe usun ew ekkei, iwe noun we Emon mi Fel epwe usun ew ngetenget, iwe epwe kareno me epwe kenieno an kewe ira fonufon me an kewe petewen fonufon non ew ran;

18 Iwe epwe kenieno ningen an petewen, me ewe masies mi uwaoch, ewe ngun me pwan ewe inis; iwe repwe usun nupwen emon chon wei finaik a peno.

19 Iwe ekkewe nussunon iran ewe petewen repwe chokukkun, pwe emon semirit epwe tongeni anneanir.

20 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe non ena ran, pwe ewe nussun Israel, me ekkewe ra ngaseno seni ewe imwen Jacob, resap chiwen apinukunuk non i ewe a wichi ir, nge repwe apinukunuk won ewe Samon, ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel, non ennet.

21 Ewe nussun epwe niwin, ewer, pwan mwo ewe nussunon Jacob, ngeni ewe Kot mi napanap.

22 Pun inamo noum aramas Israel epwe usun ewe pien neset, nge inamo ew nussur epwe niwin; ewe katano mi foruno epwe ureno ren wenechar.

23 Pun ewe Samon Koten Mwicheichen Aramas epwe fori ew tatakis, epwe pwan fis ngeni unusen ewe fonu.

24 Iei minne, iei anon ewe Samon Koten Mwicheichen Aramas: O nei aramas ekkewe ra nonnom non Zion, ousap nuokusiti ewe chon Assyria; i epwe wichikemi ren efoch wok, me epwe eitieta efoch ira ne ungenikemi, non ewe napanapen Egypt.

25 Pun ekiseno chok, me ewe song mi pungoch epwe kouno, me ai song non ar kiteter.

26 Iwe ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas epwe amwasangata ew ninni fan itan anongonong won ewe ninninon Midian non nenien ewe foun faun Oreb; iwe usun wokun a nom won ewe sat iwe i epwe pwan eitata non ewe napanapen Egypt.

27 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe non ena ran pwe achoun we epwe angeiano seni won afarom, me osan we seni won uwom, iwe osan we epwe katano pokiten ewe kepit.

28 I a feito ngeni Aiath, i a sopweino ngeni Migron; non Michmash i a isonano wan kewe kuruma.

29 Ra feino ngeni nepekin ewe aan; ra fen fori nenien asoso non Geba; Ramath a nuokus; Gibeah seni Saul a fen suno.

30 Anoumwongata ewe mongungu, O fopun seni Gallim; fori pwe Laish epwe rongorongan, O Anathoth mi riaffou.

31 Madmenah a suno; ekkewe aramasen Gebim ra ioifengeni ir pwe repwe suno.

32 Usun iei i epwe nometiw non Nob atun ewe ran; i epwe uchiki poun ngeni ewe chuken ewe fopun seni Zion, ewe chukuchukutan Jerusalem.

33 Nengeni, ewe Samon, ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas epwe pokuetiw ewe watten panen ira fiti anuokus; iwe ekkewe mi namanam tekia repwe pokupokuno; iwe ekkewe mi sikesik repwe tipetekison.

34 Iwe i epwe pokuetiw ekkewe wenuwenun ewe petewen ren efoch kouken iron, iwe Lebanon epwe turutiw me ren emon mi napanap.
2-ne 21:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 21[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewe nepopun Jesse (Kraist) epwe apungu non wenechar—Ewe mirit usun Kot epwe ponano ewe fonufan non ewe Menenium—Ewe Samon epwe seikata ew esisin me ioni Israel—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 11. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe epwe feito efoch kukkunun ira a puk seni nepopun Jesse, me efoch panen ira epwe puk seni waran kewe.

2 Iwe Ngunun ewe Samon epwe nom won i, ewe ngunun mirit me wewe, ewe ngunun aurour me manaman, ewe ngunun sinei me sufonun ewe Samon;

3 Iwe epwe fori i epwe mwitir weweiti non sufonun ewe Samon; iwe i esap apungano anongonong won kunaen mesan, esap pwan apungupung anongonong won rongorongen seningan.

4 Nge ren wenechar i epwe apungu ekkewe mi woungaw, me kapung ren pungoch fan iten ekkewe mi tipetekison seni fonufan; iwe i epwe wichi ewe fonufan ren kapasen awan, me ren ngasangasen tunnawan i epwe nieno ekkewe aramas mi ngaw.

5 Iwe wenechar epwe an achawaren nukanapan, me nukuchar epwe achawaren nepekin.

6 Ewe wonif epwe pwan nom ren ewe appanen siip, iwe ewe leopard epwe konetiw ren ewe kukkunun sike, iwe ewe appanen kou me we kukkun naion me kitinupun man repwe nomefengen; iwe emon kukkun semirit epwe emmwenir.

7 Iwe ewe kou me ewe bear repwe mwongo; nour kewe kukkun repwe kokkon fengen; iwe ewe naion epwe mwongo fetin mi pwas usun ewe oks.

8 Iwe ewe semirit mi chok oup epwe kukkunou won pwangen emon kukkunun serepenit mi poison, iwe ewe semirit a keran kouno ne oup epwe wata poun won ewe nenien serepenit mi poison.

9 Resap efeiengawa ika atano emon me non chukui kewe meinisin mi fel, pun ewe fonufan epwe ureno ren ewe mirit usun ewe Samon, usun ekkewe konik ra ponueno ewe sat.

10 Iwe non ena ran epwe wor ew waren Jesse, minne epwe uta pwe epwe ew esisinen ekkewe aramas; ekkewe chon Gentile repwe kutta ewe waren Jesse; iwe an nenien asoso epwe ningoch.

11 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito non ena ran pwe ewe Samon epwe poputa angang sefan atun ewe aruwen fansoun pwe epwe aniwinato nussun noun kewe aramas minne repwe nometiw, seni Assyria, me seni Egypt, me seni Pathros, me seni Cush, me seni Elam, me seni Sainar, me seni Eimat, me seni ekkewe fonuen neset.

12 Iwe i epwe aueta ew esisin fan iten ekkewe muu, iwe epwe achufengeni ekkewe mi katuruu seni Israel, me ioifengeni ekkewe mi toropas seni Judah seni ekkewe ruanu kinikinin fonufan.

13 Ewe nonowon Ephraim epwe pwan wesino, me ekkewe koum ngeni Judah repwe pokupokuno; Ephraim esap nonowoiti Judah, me Judah esap eriaffou Ephraim.

14 Nge repwe changeta won afaren ekkewe chon Philistia ngeni notou; repwe niapenifengeni ir seni otiw; repwe wata pour won Itam me Moab; iwe ekkewe noun Ammon repwe aneasochisi ir.

15 Iwe ewe Samon epwe unusen ataieno channawan ewe setin Egypt; iwe me ren an asepwan mi pochokun i epwe uchiki poun won ewe chonupupu, me epwe wichietiw non fisu kukkun chonupupu, me fori aramas repwe feino non nour sus.

16 Iwe epwe wor ew aanenap fan iten nussunon noun kewe aramas minne epwe nometiw, seni Assyria, usun chok a fis ngeni Israel non ewe ran i epwe feita seni ewe fonuen Egypt.
2-ne 22:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 22[/font_size][/center]

[i]Non ewe ranin menenium aramas meinisin repwe mwareiti ewe Samon—I epwe nonnom neir—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 12. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe non ena ran kopwe apasa: O Samon, upwe mwareituk; inamo ika ka song rei om song a kunnuno, iwe ka ekinamweiei.

2 Nengeni, Kot i ai chon amanau; upwe apinukunuk, iwe usap nuokus; pun ewe Samon Siowa i ai pochokun me ai kon; i a pwan winiti ai chon amanau.

3 Iei minne, ren pwapwa upwe ififiu konik seni ekkewe puachetan konikin amanau.

4 Iwe non ena ran ami oupwe apasa: Mwareiti ewe Samon, kokkori itan, affatano an kewe foffor me nein ekkewe aramas, oupwe pwarano pwe itan mi tekia.

5 Kön ngeni ewe Samon; pun i a fen fori mettoch mi echipwer; ei a fateno non unusen ewe fonufan.

6 Puchoreu me apwas, ami aramasen Zion; pun mi napanap ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel mi nom me neimi.
2-ne 23:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 23[/font_size][/center]

[i]Ewe kiteterinon Babylon a ew esisinen ewe kiteter epwe fis atun ewe Aruwen Wareto—Epwe ew ranin ningeringer me niwiningaw—Babylon (ewe fonufan) epwe turutiw feinfeino chok—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 13. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Ewe porousen riaffou an Babylon, minne Isaiah ewe noun Amoz a kuna.

2 Ekieta ew finaik won unungen ewe chuk mi tekia, anoumwongu ewe mongungu ngeni ir, uchuki ewe pau, pwe repwe feino non ekkewe tittin ekkewe aramas tekia.

3 Ua fen annuku nei kewe mi enimenimochuno, ua pwan kori nei kewe mi napanap, pun ai song ese nom won ir ekkewe ra pwapwa non ai tekia.

4 Ewe akurangen ewe mwicheich won ekkewe chuk a usun chok ew mwichen aramas mi napanap, ew neuwomwongun akurangen ekkewe muun fonu ra ioifengen, ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas a ionifengeni ekkewe mwicheichen ewe maun.

5 Ra feito seni ew fonu towaw, seni nesopun nang, ewer, ewe Samon, me ekkewe pisekin maunen an song mi pungoch, an epwe atano unusen ewe fonu.

6 Ngungures ami, pun ewe ranin ewe Samon a arapeto; epwe feito usun ew kiteter seni ewe emon mi Tekia.

7 Iei minne pau meinisin repwe apwangapwang, netipen aramas meinisin repwe peno;

8 Iwe repwe nuokus; metek mi ken me netipengaw repwe angeireno; repwe mairu emon ren emon; meser epwene usun saramen ekkei.

9 Nengeni, ewe ranin ewe Samon a feito, emmetek ren ningeringer me pwan ren song pochokun, pwe epwe fori ewe fonu epwe ponnuno; iwe i epwe nieno ekkewe chon tipis ikewe seni ewe neni.

10 Pun ekkewe fuuen nang me ekkewe mwichen fuu ikewe resap awora saramer; ewe akkar epwe rochono non an feino, iwe ewe maram esap fori saraman an epwe saram.

11 Iwe upwe ngeni niwinin ewe fonufan pokiten mi ngaw, me ekkewe aramas mi ngaw pokiten ar angangangaw; upwe fori tipewatten ewe mi namanam tekia epwe kouno, iwe upwe aukatiw sikesiken ewe mi aniweniw.

12 Upwe fori pwe emon aramas epwe kon auchea nap seni gold mi nimoch; pwan mwo emon aramas epwe auchea nap seni ewe gold mi for seni Ofer.

13 Iei minne, upwe uchuki ekkewe nang, iwe ewe fonufan epwe mwokutuu seni nenian, non ningeringerin ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, me non ewe ranin an song mi pochokun.

14 Iwe epwe usun ewe chia ir mi chei, me usun emon siip ese wor emon epwe ioni; iwe repwe pwisin niwin ngeni nour aramas, me asueno meinisin ngeni pwisin fonuer.

15 Meinisin ekkewe mi namanam tekia repwe pwos; ewer, iwe meinisin ekkewe ra chungeni ekkewe aramas mi ngaw repwe turutiw me ren ewe ketinas.

16 Nour kewe repwe pwan tatakisitiw ngeni kukkunun kinikin me mwen meser; imwer kewe repwe niapeni ir me punuwer kewe repwe ochomanau.

17 Nengeni, upwe amwasangata ekkewe Mits repwe ungeni ir, ewe esap aucheani silver me gold, resap pwan pwapwa non ir.

18 Nour kewe nikappich repwe pwan atatakisi ekkewe anuon ngeni kukkunun kinikin; iwe esap wor ar kirekiroch won uwan ewe neenuk; meser esap amanaua ekkewe semirit.

19 Iwe Babylon, ewe ningen ekkewe muu, ewe ningochun an ekkewe chon Kalti echipwer, epwe usun nupwen Kot a akkufatiw Sodom me Gomorrah.

20 Esap tongeni epwe masow, esap pwan wor epwe nonnom non seni fansoun tori fansoun: ekkewe chon Arabia resap pwan aueta imwer kewe imw mangaku ikewe; ekkewe chon masen siip resap pwan fori ar nenien siip ikewe.

21 Nge ekkewe man mwachon ewe fonu pon repwe nonnom ikewe; iwe imwer kewe repwe ureno ren man mi nikinikingaw; me ekkewe koki repwe nonnom ikewe, me ekkewe niemwanin sike repwe pworuk ikewe.

22 Iwe ekkewe man mwachon ekkewe fonuen neset repwe puchor non imwer kewe mi ponnuno, me ekkewe dragon non imwer kewe mi ning watte; iwe an fansoun a arap epwe feito, me ranin esap mangeno. Pun upwe mwitir ataieno; ewer, pun upwe umoumoch ngeni nei kewe aramas, nge ekkewe aramas mi ngaw repwe mano non pekin ngun.
2-ne 24:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 24[/font_size][/center]

[i]Israel epwe ioifengen me epwe weri ewe kinamwein Menenium—Lucifer a katuruu seni nang pokiten an ungeni—Israel epwe akkufu Babylon (ewe fonufan)—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 14. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwirin Kraist.[/i]

1 Pun ewe Samon epwe wor an umoumoch won Jacob, iwe epwe pwan finata Israel, iwe epwe anenier non pwisin fonuer; iwe ekkewe chon ekis repwe pachengenir, iwe repwe chungeni ewe imwen Jacob.

2 Iwe ekkewe aramas repwe angei ir me uwei ir ngeni nenier; ewer, seni towaw ngeni nesoponon fonufan; iwe repwe niwin ngeni fonuer kewe fonuen pwon. Iwe ewe imwen Israel epwe nemenireno, iwe ewe fonuen ewe Samon epwe nenien chon angang me fefin chon angang; iwe repwe uwei ir ngeni fotek ngeni ir ekkewe mi fen fotekini ir me akkom, iwe repwe nemenem won ekkewe chon ariaffour.

3 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito non ena ran pwe ewe Samon epwe ngonuk asoso, seni om netipengaw, me seni om nuokus, me seni ewe fotek mi weires minne ka echimw pwe kopwe anganga.

4 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito non ena ran, pwe kopwe poputa ne apasa ekkei kapas ngeni ewe kingen Babylon, me apasa: Ifa usun an ewe chon ariaffou a kouno, ewe teninimw mi for seni gold a kouno!

5 Ewe Samon a fen kupi ewe fochun ira an ekkewe aramas mi ngaw, me ewe wokun nemenem an ekkewe chon nemenem.

6 I ewe a wichi ekkewe aramas non ningeringer fiti ew soposoponon wopup, ewe a nemeni ewe muu non song, a riaffou, iwe esap wor emon epwe aukatiw.

7 Ewe unusen fonufan a asoso, iwe a fanafaneno; ra puchoruu non kön.

8 Ewer, ekkewe ira fir ra pwapwa reom, me pwan ekkewe ira cedar non Lebanon, ra apasa: Nupwen ka turutiw esap wor chon pokupok ira epwe feita ungenikem.

9 Hell seni fan a mwokut fan itom pwe epwe churuk atun om feito; a amwasangata ekkewe mi mano fan itom, pwan mwo ekkewe ir mi auchea seni ewe fonufan; a aueta ekkewe kingen ekkewe muu meinisin seni ar kewe nenien mwottun king.

10 Meinisin repwe kapas me apasa ngonuk: Ka pwan apwangapwangeno usun am? Ka pwan winiti usun am?

11 Om ning a turutiw ngeni ewe peias; ese wor chon rongorong ngeni akurangen noum kewe viol; ewe nikanipun a mereseno fom, me ekkewe nikanipun ra ponukeno.

12 Ifa usun om ka turutiw seni nang, O Lucifer, noun ewe nesossor! Ifa usun ka pokupokutiw ngeni ewe puun, ewe a akkufatiw ekkewe muu!

13 Pun ka fen ekieki non netipom: Upwe feita ngeni nang, upwe atekia ai nenien mwottun king asan ekkewe fuuen Kot; upwe pwan momot won ewe chuken nenien mwich, non ekkewe towawen kianin ennefen.

14 Upwe feita asan unungen ekkewe kuchu; upwe usun ewe mi Unusen Tekia.

15 Nge inamo kopwe katurutiw ngeni hell, ngeni ekkewe towawen kianin ewe pwang.

16 Ir ekkewe repwe kunok repwe attonaochuk, iwe repwe nenengenuk, iwe repwe apasa: Iei i ewe mwan a fori ewe fonufan pwe epwe chechech, ewe a achechechi ekkewe muu?

17 Me fori ewe fonufan epwe usun ew fonu pon, me ataieno ekkewe teninimw ikewe, me ese suki ewe imwen noun kewe chok fotek?

18 Meinisin ekkewe kingen ekkewe muu, ewer, ir meinisin, ra konetiw non ning, emon me emon neir non pwisin imwan.

19 Nge ka fen katuruu seni peiasom usun efoch popun ira mi anieput, iwe ewe nussunon ekkewe ra mano, ra pwos me ren efoch ketinas, ekkewe ra feitiw ngeni ekkewe fau non ewe pwang; usun inisin aramas mi mano ra puratiw fan peche.

20 Kosap chungeni ir me non peias, pokiten ka fen ataieno fonuom me nieno noum kewe aramas; mwirimwirin aramas ra fofforungaw resap tongeni itefouno.

21 Amonnata ninninon noun kewe pokiten fofforungawen semer kewe, pwe resap angei sefan pochokun, resap pwan fonueni ewe fonu, resap pwan aurano unusen ewe fonufan ren teninimw.

22 Pun upwe poputa ne ungeni ir, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, me pokupokuno seni Babylon itan we, me ewe nussun, me noun at, me noun pwin at, anon ewe Samon.

23 Upwe pwan fori epwe ew neni mi pon fan iten ekkewe machang, me nönön konik; iwe upwe pirumwei me ren efoch pirumen kiteter, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas.

24 Ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas a fen pwon, a apasa: Ennet met ua fen ekieki, iwe epwe pwan pwonueta; iwe met ua fen kokkot, epwe fisino—

25 Pwe upwe emmweni ewe chon Assyria non fonuei we, iwe won chukui kewe upwe akkufatiw i fan peche; mwirin osan kewe repwe suseni i, iwe achoun we epwe suseni afarer.

26 Iei ewe popun a fen kokkotono fan iten unusen fonufan; iwe iei ewe pau ewe a aitieu won muu meinisin.

27 Pun ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas a fen akokkotono, iwe ion epwe eppeti? Iwe poun a fen aitieu, iwe ion epwe eniwinangong?

28 Non ewe ier nupwen king Ahaz a mano ina ewe porousen riaffou.

29 Kosap pwapwa, unusen Palestina, pokiten ewe wokun i ewe a wichiuk a kup; pun seni popun ewe serepenit epwe tou emon serepenit mi poison, iwe uwan epwe emon serepenit mi akkas me ngetenget.

30 Iwe ewe a aewin uputiw seni ewe mi woungaw epwe mwongo, iwe ewe mi osupwang epwe konetiw non tumun; iwe upwe nieno popum we ren nengita, iwe i epwe nieno nussum we.

31 Ngungures, O tit; puchor, O teninimw; ami, unusen Palestina, ka moreno; pun ew otuot epwe feito seni ennefen, iwe esap wor emon epwe anamon non an kewe fansoun mi fisino.

32 Met epwe ponuan ekkewe chon kunon ekkewe muu? Pwe ewe Samon a forata Zion, iwe ekkewe mi woungaw nein noun kewe aramas repwe apinukunuk non.
2-ne 25:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 25[/font_size][/center]

[i]Nifai a pwapwa non fatafatoch—An Isaiah kewe osini repwe weweoch non ekkewe ranin soponon—Ekkewe chon Jew repwe niwin seni Babylon, repwe irapengesi ewe Messiah, me repwe toropas fetan me ninni—Repwe niwin nupwen ra nuku non ewe Messiah—I epwe akkom feito wonepuku ier mwirin Liai a suseni Jerusalem—Ekkewe chon Nifai ra aneasochisi ewe annukun Moses me nuku non Kraist, i ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwirin Kraist.[/i]

1 Iei ngang, Nifai, ua kapas ita usun ekkewe kapas minne ua fen makkei, minne ra fen kapas me ren awen Isaiah. Pun nengeni, Isaiah a kapas chommong mettoch minne ra weires ngeni chommong me nein nei kewe aramas ar repwe weweiti; pun rese sinei usun ewe napanapen osini me nein ekkewe chon Jew.

2 Pun ngang, Nifai, usamo aiti ir chommong mettoch usun napanapen ekkewe chon Jew; pun ar kewe angang ra angangen rochopwak, me ar kewe foffor ra fofforun anieput.

3 Ina minne, ua mak ngeni nei aramas, ngeni meinisin ekkewe repwe angei ekkei mettoch non fansoun mwach minne ua makkei, pwe repwe tongeni sinei ekkewe kapung an Kot, pwe repwe feito won ekkewe muu meinisin, anongonong won ewe kapas minne i a fen apasa.

4 Ina minne, ausening, O nei aramas, minne ekkewe seni ewe imwen Israel, iwe ausening ngeni ai kapas; pun pokiten ekkewe kapas an Isaiah rese fatafatoch ngeni kemi, nge inamo ra fatafatoch ngeni meinisin ekkewe ra uren ewe ngunun osini. Nge upwe ngenikemi ew osini, anongonong won ewe ngun minne a nom non ngang; ina minne upwe osini anongonong won ewe fatafatoch minne a fen nonnom rei seni ewe fansoun ua tou seni Jerusalem fiti semei we; pun nengeni, nguni a pwapwa non fatafatoch ngeni nei aramas, pwe repwe tongeni kaeo.

5 Ewer, iwe nguni a pwapwa non ekkewe kapas an Isaiah, pun ua tou seni Jerusalem, iwe mesei a fen kuna ekkewe mettochun ekkewe chon Jew, iwe ua sinei pwe ekkewe chon Jew ra weweiti ekkewe mettochun ekkewe soufos, iwe ese pwan wor ekkoch aramas ra weweiti ekkewe mettoch minne ra kapas ngeni ekkewe chon Jew usur, tiwenon chok ika ra aiti ir non ewe napanapen ekkewe mettochun ekkewe chon Jew.

6 Nge nengeni, ngang, Nifai, usamo aiti nei kewe non ewe napanapen ekkewe chon Jew; nge nengeni, ngang, pwisin won inisi, ua fen nom non Jerusalem, ina minne ua sinei usun ekkewe kinikin neni ikewe; iwe ua fen apasa ngeni nei kewe usun ekkewe kapung an Kot, minne ra fen fisino me nein ekkewe chon Jew, ngeni nei kewe, anongonong won meinisin minne Isaiah a fen apasa, iwe use makker.

7 Nge nengeni, ua soposopono ren pwisin ai osini, anongonong won ai fatafatoch; non ewe fatafatoch ua sinei pwe ese wor emon aramas a tongeni mwanino non ar weweiti; nge inamo, non ekkewe ran ekkewe osini an Isaiah repwe pwonueta aramas repwe ennetin sinei wewen ekkewe osini an Isaiah, atun ekkewe fansoun nupwen repwe pwonueta.

8 Ina minne, ra auchea ngeni ekkewe noun aramas, iwe i ewe a ekieki pwe rese auchea, ngeni ir upwe kapas akkaewin ngeni ir, iwe upwe auku ekkewe kapas ngeni pwisin nei aramas; pun ua sinei pwe repwe wesen auchea ngeni ir non ekkewe ranin soponon; pun non ena ran repwe weweiti ir; ina minne, ren ochur ua fen makker.

9 Iwe usun ew tappin aramas a fen ninnino me nein ekkewe chon Jew pokiten ar angangangaw, usun chok ra fen ninnino seni ew tappin aramas ngeni ew tappin aramas anongonong won ar kewe fofforungaw; iwe esap mwo emon me neir a fen ninnino tiwenon chok ika a osini ngeni ir seni ekkewe soufosun ewe Samon.

10 Ina minne, a fen fatengeni ir usun ewe kiteter minne epwe feito wor, epwe mwitir mwirin chok semei we a suseni Jerusalem; nge inamo, ra apochokunano netiper; iwe anongonong won ai we osini ra fen mano, tiwenon chok ekkewe ra uweireno non fotek ngeni Babylon.

11 Iwe iei ei ua kapas pokiten ewe ngun minne a nom non ngang. Iwe inamo ra fen uweiareno repwe pwan niwin sefan, me fonueni ewe fonuen Jerusalem; ina minne, repwe niwinfengen sefan ngeni ewe fonuen ar kewe neuo.

12 Nge, nengeni, epwe wor ar maun, me ekkewe porousen maun; iwe nupwen ewe ran epwe feito pwe Noun ewe Sam Anamon, ewer, pwan mwo ewe Semenapen nang me ewe fonufan, epwe pwarano pwisin inisin ngeni ir non ewe aion, nengeni, resap etiwa i, pokiten ar kewe fofforungaw, me pochokunen netiper, me kumen uwer.

13 Nengeni, repwe irapengesi i; iwe mwirin ra akonatiw non ew nenien peias ren ukukun unungat ran i epwe manau seni mano, fiti ewe pochokunen chikar non poun; iwe meinisin ekkewe ra nuku non itan we repwe manau non ewe muun Kot. Ina minne, nguni a pwapwa ne osini usun i, pun ua fen kuna ranin we, iwe netipei a mwareiti itan mi fel.

14 Iwe nengeni ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe mwirin ewe Messiah a fen manaueta seni mano, me fen pwarano pwisin inisin ngeni noun kewe aramas, ngeni pwan meinisin repwe nuku non itan we, ngeni, Jerusalem epwe pwan tano sefan; pun riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra fiu ngeni Kot me ekkewe aramasen an we mwichefen.

15 Ina minne, ekkewe chon Jew repwe toropas fetan me nein muu meinisin; ewer, me pwan Babylon epwe tano; ina minne, ekkewe chon Jew repwe toropas fetan me ren ekkoch muu.

16 Iwe mwirin ra fen toropas fetan, me ewe Samon Kot a fen ninni ir me ren ekkoch muu ren ukukun chommong tappin fansoun, ewer, pwan feitiw seni ew tappin aramas ngeni ew tappin aramas tori ar repwe pesepes ne nuku non Kraist, ewe Noun Kot, me ewe achasefan, minne esemuch fan iten aramas meinisin—iwe nupwen ena ran epwe feito pwe repwe nuku non Kraist, me fel ngeni ewe Sam non itan we, fiti netip mi nimenimoch me pau mi nimoch, me resap chiwen esuku pwan emon Messiah, mwirinon, atun ena fansoun, ewe ran epwe feito pwe mi auchea pwe repwe nuku ekkei mettoch.

17 Iwe ewe Samon epwe poputa angang sefan poun atun ewe aruwen fansoun pwe epwe aniwini noun kewe aramas seni ar nikinikin monucheno me non ew turutiwen nikinik. Ina minne, i epwe soposopono ne fori ew angang mi auchea me amwarar me nein ekkewe noun aramas.

18 Ina minne, i epwe wato an kewe kapas ngeni ir, ekkewe kapas repwe apungur atun ewe ranin soponon, pun repwe kawor ngeni ir fan iten ewe popun an epwe peser usun ewe Messiah mi ennet, ewe ese ketiw me rer; me fan iten an epwe peser pwe resap chiwen esuku pwan emon Messiah an epwe feito, pun esap chiwen wor epwe feito, tiwenon chok ika epwe emon Messiah mi chofona minne epwe atupano ekkewe aramas; pun mi wor emon chok Messiah a kapas usun seni ekkewe soufos, iwe ewe Messiah i ewe esap ketiw me ren ekkewe chon Jew.

19 Pun anongonong won ekkewe kapas an ekkewe soufos, ewe Messiah epwe feito non wonepuku ier seni ewe fansoun semei we a suseni Jerusalem; iwe anongonong won ekkewe kapas an ekkewe soufos, me pwan ewe kapas an ewe chon nangin Kot, itan epwe Jises Kraist, ewe Noun Kot.

20 Iwe iei, ami pwi, ua fen kapas fatafatoch pwe ousap mwanino non ami weweiti. Iwe usun ewe Samon Kot mi manau ewe a emmwenau Israel seni ewe fonuen Egypt, me ngeni Moses pochokun pwe i epwe echikara ekkewe muu mwirin ekkewe serepenit mi poison ra kur, ika pwe repwe nenetai meser ngeni ewe serepenit minne i a seikata me mwer, me pwan ngeni i pochokun pwe i epwe wichi ewe fau me konik epwe kus seni; ewer, nengeni ua apasa ngenikemi, pwe usun ekkei mettoch mi ennet, me usun ewe Samon Kot mi manau, ese pwan wor ew it a kawor fan nang tiwenon chok epwe ei Jises Kraist, usun minne ua fen apasa, ren minne aramas repwe tongeni manau.

21 Ina minne, ren ei popun ewe Samon Kot a pwon ngeniei pwe ekkei mettoch minne ua makkei repwe isois me tumun, me keititiw ngeni mwirimwiri, seni ew tappin aramas ngeni ew tappin aramas, pwe ewe pwon epwe pwonueta ngeni Joseph, pwe mwirimwirin kewe resap tongeni mano non ukukun ewe fonufan epwe nonnom.

22 Ina minne, ekkei mettoch repwe feino seni ew tappin aramas ngeni ew tappin aramas non ukukun ewe fonufan epwe nonnom; iwe repwe feino anongonong won ewe mochen me met epwe fich ngeni netipan Kot; iwe ekkewe muu ekkewe repwe pisekinir repwe kapung me rer anongonong won ekkewe kapas minne ra makkeno.

23 Pun am aua nikitu ne mak, pwe am aupwe pesei nöum kewe, me pwan pwium kewe, pwe repwe nuku non Kraist, me repwe siwini nonnomur ngeni Kot; pun am aua sinei pwe a seni chen kich sia manau, mwirinon meinisin met sia tongeni fori.

24 Iwe, inamo am aua nuku non Kraist, aua aneasochisi ewe annuk an Moses, me esuku fiti tipepos ngeni Kraist, tori ewe annuk epwe pwonueta.

25 Pun, ren ei popun ewe annuk a kawor; ina minne ewe annuk usun a mano fan itach, iwe sia manau non pekin ngun punun Kraist pokiten ach nuku; nge inamo sia aneasochisi ewe annukun Moses pokiten ekkewe annuk.

26 Iwe am aua kapas usun Kraist, aua pwapwa non Kraist, aua afanafan usun Kraist, aua osini usun Kraist, me aua mak anongonong won am kewe osini, pwe nöum kewe repwe sinei ngeni ian repwe apinukunuk won ren omusomusen ar kewe tipis.

27 Ina minne, sia kapas usun ewe annuk pwe nouch kewe repwe sinei usun manon ewe annuk; iwe ir, seni ar sinei usun manon ewe annuk, repwe neneno mwer ngeni ewe manau minne a nom non Kraist, me sinei ren met popun ewe annuk a kawor. Iwe mwirin ewe annuk a pwonueta non Kraist, pwe mi auchea pwe resap apochokunano netiper seni i nupwen ewe annuk epwe wesino.

28 Iwe iei nengeni, nei aramas, ami oua aramas nukumach; ina minne, ua fen kapas fatafatoch ngenikemi, pwe ami ousap tongei mwanino non ami weweiti. Iwe ekkewe kapas minne ua apasa repwe nom usun ew kapasen pwarata usun fofforum; pun ra naf ne aiti emon aramas ewe aan mi pung; pun ewe aan mi pung pwe sipwe nuku non Kraist me sisap amam i; pun ika oua amam i oua pwan amam ekkewe soufos me ewe annuk.

29 Iwe iei nengeni, ua apasa ngeni kemi pwe ewe aan mi pung pwe sipwe nuku non Kraist, me sisap amam i; iwe Kraist i ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel; ina minne oupwe chappetiw me mwen i, me fel ngeni i ren unusen ami tongeni, ekiek, me pochokun, me unusen ngunumi; iwe ika ami oua fori ei ousap katuruu.

30 Iwe, non ukukun an epwe auchea, ami oupwe aneasochisi ekkewe mwokutukut me angangepin an Kot tori ewe annuk epwe pwonueta minne a kawor ngeni Moses.
2-ne 26:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 26[/font_size][/center]

[i]Kraist epwe afanafan ngeni ekkewe chon Nifai—Nifai a osini kiteterinon noun kewe aramas—Repwe kapas seni ewe puun—Ekkewe chon Gentile repwe aueta ekkoch mwichefen mi chofona me mwicheich mi monomon—Ewe Samon a annuku aramas pwe resap anganga mwokutukutun pris. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe mwirin Kraist epwe manaueta seni mano i epwe pwarano inisin ngenikemi, nei, me pwi achengicheng; iwe ekkewe kapas minne i epwe apasa ngenikemi repwe annuk minne ami oupwe fori.

2 Pun nengeni, ua apasa ngeni kemi pwe ua fen kuna pwe chommong tappin fansoun repwe wesino, iwe epwe wor maun watte me anini fengen nein nei kewe aramas.

3 Iwe mwirin ewe Messiah epwe feito epwe wor esisin epwe kawor ngeni nei kewe aramas usun uputiwan we, me pwan usun an we mano me manausefan; iwe ena ran epwe fokkun auchea me anoninen ngeni ekkewe aramas mi ngaw, pun repwe mano; iwe repwe mano pokiten ar asueu ekkewe soufos, me ekkewe souneng, me moner ngeni fau, me nireno; ina minne sion chan ekkewe souneng repwe feita ngeni Kot seni ewe puun pwe epwe ungeni ir.

4 Ina minne, meinisin ekkewe ra namanam tekia, me ra fori mi ngaw, ena ran epwe feito epwe kenireno, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, pun repwe usun fetin mi pwas.

5 Iwe ir ekkewe ra nieno ekkewe soufos, me ekkewe souneng, ewe anonnonun ewe puun epwe oromareno, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas; me ekkewe chuk repwe ponureno, me ekkewe ewuniar repwe uweiareno, me imw watte repwe turutiw wor me apachacheretiw ngeni kukkunun kinikin me wusi ir ngeni powder.

6 Iwe epwe churir chopunap, me inefi, me chechin fonu, me sokopaten kiteter meinisin, pun ewe ekkein songen ewe Samon epwe poputa ungeni ir, iwe repwe usun fetin mi pwas, iwe ewe ran epwe feito epwe kenireno, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas.

7 O ewe metek, me ewe riaffoun ngunui pokiten poutunon manon nei kewe aramas! Pun ngang, Nifai, ua fen kuna, iwe epwe fen pwan kekino me mwen mesen ewe Samon; nge upwe sio ngeni ai Kot: Om kewe eereni mi pung.

8 Nge nengeni, ekkewe mi tupwon ra aneasochis ngeni ekkewe kapas an ekkewe soufos, iwe rese nireno, nge ra esuku Kraist fiti tipepos fiti ekkewe esisin minne ra kawor, me nukun meinisin eriaffou—nengeni, ir ekkewe minne resap mano.

9 Nge ewe Noun mi Wenechar epwe pwato ngeni ir; iwe i epwe echikarer, iwe epwe wor ar kinamwe me ren, tori unungat tappin fansoun epwe wesino, iwe chommong seni ewe aruwanun tappin aramas repwene fen mano non wenechar.

10 Iwe nupwen ekkei mettoch ra wesino ew mwitir kiteter epwe feito ngeni nei kei aramas; pun, me nukun ekkewe metekin ngunui, ua fen kuna; ina minne, ua sinei pwe epwe fisino; iwe repwe pwisin amömöreno non namotongaw; pun, ren niwinin ar namanam tekia me ar umwes repwe kini uwan kiteter; pun pokiten ra tup ngeni ewe tefin me finata ekkewe angangen rochopwak nap seni saram, iei minne repwe feitiw ngeni hell.

11 Pun Ngunun ewe Samon esap chok angang ren aramas fansoun meinisin. Iwe nupwen ewe Ngun a kouno ne angang ren aramas iwe epwe mwitir feito kiteter, iwe ei a enetipengawa ngunui.

12 Iwe nupwen ua kapas usun pesepesen ekkewe chon Jew, pwe Jises i ewe ennetin Kraist, mi auchea pwe ekkewe chon Gentile repwe pwan pesepes pwe Jises i ewe Kraist, ewe Kot Esemuch;

13 Iwe pwe i a pwarano pwisin inisin ngeni meinisin ekkewe ra nuku non i, seni ewe manamanen ewe Ngun mi Fel; ewer, ngeni muu meinisin, einang, sokopaten kapas, me aramas, anganga manaman, esisin, me mettoch mi amwarar mi napanap, me nein ekkewe noun aramas anongonong won ar nuku.

14 Nge nengeni, ua osini ngenikemi usun ekkewe ranin soponon; usun ekkewe ran nupwen ewe Samon Kot epwe uweiato ekkei mettoch ngeni ekkewe noun aramas.

15 Mwirin mwirimwiri kewe me mwirimwirin pwi kewe repwe kukkununo non ar nuku, me repwe wichiwich me ren ekkewe chon Gentile; ewer, mwirin ewe Samon Kot epwe fen aueta nenian pwe epwe ungeni ir, me epwe rokopwanireno ren ew chukuchukuta, me aueta teninimw epwe ungeni ir; iwe mwirin ar repwene turutiw non ewe puun, pwan mwo ika resap chiwen manau, nge inamo ekkewe kapas an ekkewe mi tupwon repwe makkeno, me ekkewe iotek an ekkewe mi nikitu Kot epwe rongorong, me meinisin ekkewe repwe kukkununo non ar nuku aramas resap monnukano usur.

16 Ren ekkewe repwe ninnino repwe kapas ngeni ir seni ewe puun, iwe ar kewe porous repwe feiniu seni ewe puun, iwe mongungur epwe usun emon mi sou-wananu; pun ewe Samon Kot epwe ngeni i pochokun, pwe i epwe mongunungun usur, usun ita a tou seni ewe puun; iwe ar poraus repwe mongunungunuu seni ewe puun.

17 Pun iei anon ewe Samon Kot: Repwe makkei ekkewe mettoch minne repwe fis me neir, iwe repwe makkeno me eppunguno non ew puk, iwe ekkewe ra fen kukkununo non ar nuku resap angei ir, pun ra kutta ar repwe ataieno ekkewe mettochun Kot.

18 Ina minne, usun ekkewe ra fen ninnino ra fen mwitir ninnino; iwe ewe mwicheichen aramasen ekkewe mi anoninen repwe usun unuchen foun ira ra moreno—ewer, iei anon ewe Samon Kot: Epwe fis non ew fansoun mi mwochomwoch, epwe mwitir—

19 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito, pwe ekkewe ra fen kukkununo non ar nuku repwe wichiwich me ren poun ekkewe chon Gentile.

20 Iwe ekkewe chon Gentile ra sikasini non namanam tekian ne meser, iwe ra turuno, pokiten ar we foun chepetek mi napanap, pwe ra fen forata chommong mwichefen; nge inamo, ra turunufasei ewe pochokunen me manamanen Kot, me pwisin afanafana ngeni ir ar mirit me ar pwisin kaeo, pwe repwe pisekisekino me repwe wusi won mesen ekkewe mi woungaw.

21 Iwe a wor chommong mwichefen ra kauuta minne ra forata angangen nonowo, me anini, me ewe mochenin efeiengaw.

22 Iwe a pwan wor mwicheich mi monomon, pwan mwo usun non ekkewe fansoun nom, anongonong won ekkewe mwicheich mi monomon an ewe tefin, pun i ewe chon forata ekkei mettoch meinisin; ewer, ewe chon forata nii manau, me ekkewe angangen rochopwak; ewer, iwe i a emmwenireno me ren uwer fiti efoch san a for seni flax, tori an a fotireno ren an kewe san mi pochokun feinfeino chok.

23 Pun nengeni, ami pwi achengicheng, ua apasa ngenikemi pwe ewe Samon Kot ese angang non rochopwak.

24 Ese fori och mettoch tiwenon chok ika pwe epwe efeiochu fonufan; pun i a tongei ewe fonufan, pwan mwo i a pwisin watiw manauan pwe i epwe emerato aramas meinisin ngeni i. Ina minne, i ese annuku emon pwe resap angei seni an amanau.

25 Nengeni, i a puchor ngeni emon, a apasa: Feino seniei? Nengeni, ua apasa ngenikemi, Apw; nge i a apasa: Feito ngeniei ami meinisin ekis meinisin non ewe fonufan, kame milik me punech, nge esap ren moni me ese wor niwinin.

26 Nengeni, i a annuku ekkoch pwe repwe feino seni ekkewe sinakok, ika seni ekkewe imwen fel? Nengeni, ua apasa ngenikemi, Apw.

27 I a annuku ekkoch pwe resap angei seni an we amanau? Nengeni ua apasa ngenikemi, Apw; nge i a awora nge esap wor niwin ngeni aramas meinisin; iwe i a fen annuku noun kewe aramas pwe repwe pesei aramas meinisin pwe repwe aier.

28 Nengeni, met ewe Samon a annuku ekkoch pwe resap angei seni an kirekiroch? Nengeni ua apasa ngenikemi, Apw; nge aramas meinisin ra tufich ewe emon me usun ewe pwan emon, iwe ese wor emon epwe tiweno.

29 I a annuku pwe esap wor mwokutukutun pris; pun, nengeni, ekkewe mwokutukutun pris ra era pwe aramas repwe afanafan me etekiareta pwe repwe ew saram ngeni ewe fonufan, pwe repwe pisekisekino me itefouno nein chon fonufan; nge rese kutta tufichin Zion.

30 Nengeni, ewe Samon a annuku ei mettoch; ina minne, ewe Samon Kot a awora ew annuk pwe aramas meinisin epwe wor ar tong ennet, ewe tong ennet ina tong. Iwe ika ese wor ar tong ennet repwe namotongaw. Ina minne, ika epwe wor ar tong ennet iwe resap mut ngeni ewe chon angang non Zion epwe mano.

31 Nge ewe chon angang non Zion epwe angang fan iten Zion; pun ika repwe angang fan iten moni iwe repwe mano non ngun.

32 Iwe sefan, ewe Samon Kot a fen annuku pwe aramas resap nii manau; pwe resap chofona; pwe resap sona; pwe resap pan-muani iten ewe Samon Kot; pwe resap nonowo; pwe esap wor ar mochenin efeiengaw; pwe resap anini fengen nefiner; pwe resap fori nisou; me resap fori ew me nein ekkei mettoch; pun ion a forir epwe mano non ngun.

33 Pun ese wor ew me nein ekkei angang mi ngaw a feito seni ewe Samon; pun i a fori met mi öch me nein ekkewe noun aramas; me i ese fori och mettoch tiwenon chok ika a fatafatoch ngeni ekkewe noun aramas; me i a etiwer meinisin pwe repwe feito ngeni i me angei seni an kirekiroch; iwe ese amam emon epwe feito ngeni i, chon me pwechepwech, chon fotek me chon ngaseno, mwan me fefin; iwe i a chechemeni ewe ese sinei namanam; me meinisin ra nonno chok ngeni Kot, ir me ru chon Jew me chon Gentile.
2-ne 27:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 27[/font_size][/center]

[i]Rochopwak me fansoun rochopwak epwe ponueno ewe fonufan non ekkewe ranin soponon—Ewe Puken Mormon epwe feito—Unumon chon pwarata repwe pwarata usun ewe puk—Ewe mwan mi tipachem epwe apasa pwe i ese tongeni anneani ewe puk mi eppunguno—Ewe Samon epwe fori ew angang mi auchea me amwarar—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 29. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Nge, nengeni, non ekkewe ranin soponon, are non ekkewe ranin ekkewe chon Gentile—ewer, nengeni ekkewe muun chon Gentile meinisin me pwan ekkewe chon Jew, ir me ru ekkewe repwe feito won ei fonu me ekkewe repwe nom won ekkoch fonu, ewer, pwan mwo won ekkewe fonuen ewe fonufan meinisin, nengeni, repwe sakaweno ren angangangaw me sokopaten angang mi anieput meinisin—

2 Iwe nupwen ena ran epwe feito repwe chu me ren ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, fiti chopunap me fiti chechin fonu, me fiti ew akurang mi neuwomong, me fiti monumon, me fiti asepwan watte, me fiti ngetengetin ekkei mi kareno.

3 Iwe ekkewe muu meinisin minne ra fiu ngeni Zion, me ekkewe ra ariaffouni, repwene usun ew tanen nemwasepwi nepwin; ewer, epwe fis ngeni ir, usun chok ita ngeni emon mwan mi echik minne a tan, iwe nengeni i epwe mwongo nge a neno me ngunun mi pon; are usun emon mwan mi kaka minne a tan, iwe nengeni i a ka nge a neno me nengeni i mi apwangapwang, me a wor an ngunun mochenin mwongo; ewer, usun ita ewe mwicheichen ekkewe muu meinisin minne ra fiu ngeni Zion.

4 Pun nengeni, ami meinisin oua angangangaw, oupwe kouno me mwar, pun oupwe ngunguresiu, me puchor; ewer, oupwe sakaweno nge esap ren wain, oupwe taroporop nge esap ren sakaw.

5 Pun nengeni, ewe Samon a ninatiw womi ewe ngunun mouruchou. Pun nengeni, oua fen apungano mesemi, me oua poutano ekkewe soufos; me noumi kewe chon nemenem, me ekkewe chon osini i a angeireno pokiten ami angangangaw.

6 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe ewe Samon Kot epwe uweiato ngenikemi ekkewe kapasen ew puk, iwe repwe kapasen ir ekkewe ra fen ammouruno.

7 Iwe nengeni ewe puk epwe eppunguno; iwe non ewe puk epwe wor ew pwarata seni Kot, seni nepoputan ewe fonufan tori nesoponon we.

8 Ina minne, pokiten ekkewe mettoch minne ra eppunguno, ekkewe mettoch minne ra eppunguno resap kawor non ewe ranin fofforungaw me angang mi anieput an ekkewe aramas. Ina minne ewe puk epwe moneno seni ir.

9 Nge ewe puk epwe kawor ngeni emon mwan, iwe i epwe wano ekkewe kapasen ewe puk, minne ir kapasen ekkewe ra fen ammouruno non ewe puun, iwe i epwe wano ekkei kapas ngeni pwan emon;

10 Nge ekkewe kapas minne mi eppunguno i esap wano, i esap pwan wano ewe puk. Pun ewe puk epwe eppunguno seni ewe manamanen Kot, iwe ewe pwarata minne mi eppunguno epwe nometiw non ewe puk tori ewe pwisin fansoun an ewe Samon, pwe repwe feito; pun nengeni, ra pwari mettoch meinisin seni nongonongen ewe fonufan tori nesoponon we.

11 Iwe ewe ran a feito pwe ekkewe kapasen ewe puk minne ir mi eppunguno repwe annea me won unungen ekkewe imw; iwe repwe annea me ren ewe manamanen Kraist; iwe mettoch meinisin repwe pwano ngeni ekkewe noun aramas minne ir mi fen nonnom me nein ekkewe noun aramas, me minne repwe nonnom tori nesoponon ewe fonufan.

12 Ina minne, atun ena ran nupwen ewe puk epwe kawor ngeni ewe mwan minne ua fen kapas usun, ewe puk epwe kopeno seni ekkewe mesen fonufan, pwe esap wor mesen emon epwe kuna tiwenon chok pwe ekkewe unumon chon pwarata repwe kuna, seni ewe manamanen Kot, me nukun i ewe epwe kawor ngeni ewe puk; iwe repwe pwarata usun ennetin ewe puk me ekkewe mettoch me non.

13 Iwe ese pwan wor emon minne epwe kuna, tiwenon chok fitemon anongonong won ewe mochenin Kot, ar repwe apasa ar kapasen pwarata usun an kapas ngeni ekkewe noun aramas; pun ewe Samon Kot a fen apasa pwe ekkewe kapas an ewe mi nikitu epwe kapas usun ita epwe seni ewe mi mano.

14 Ina minne, ewe Samon Kot epwe soposopono ne uweiato ekkewe kapasen ewe puk; iwe non awen chommong chon pwarata usun mi öch me ren i epwe forata an kapas; me riaffou epwe ngeni i ewe a poutano ewe kapasen Kot!

15 Nge nengeni, ewe fansoun epwe feito pwe ewe Samon Kot epwe apasa ngeni i ion i epwe ngeni ewe puk: Angei ekkei kapas minne rese eppunguno me ngeni pwan emon, pwe i epwe pwari ir ngeni ewe mi tipachem, me apasa: Anneani ei, ua tingor ngonuk. Iwe ewe mi tipachem epwe apasa: Wato ewe puk, iwe upwe anneani ir.

16 Iwe iei, pokiten mwareitin ewe fonufan me ar repwe pisekisekino repwe apasa ei, me esap ren sufonun Kot.

17 Iwe ewe mwan epwe apasa: Use tongeni uweiato ewe puk, pun mi eppunguno.

18 Mwirin ewe mi tipachem epwe apasa: Use tongeni anneani.

19 Ina minne ewe fansoun epwe feito, pwe ewe Samon Kot epwe awora sefan ewe puk me kapasan kewe ngeni i ewe ese tipachem; iwe ewe mwan ese tipachem epwe apasa: Use tipachem.

20 Mwirin ewe Samon Kot epwe apasa ngeni i: Ewe mi tipachem esap anneani ir, pun ra fen poutireno, iwe ua tongeni fori pwisin ai angang; ina minne kopwe anneani ekkewe kapas minne upwe ngonuk.

21 Kosap attapa ekkewe mettoch minne mi eppunguno, pun upwe uweiareto non ai we pwisin fansoun; pun upwe pwar ngeni ekkewe noun aramas pwe ngang mi tongeni pwisin fori ai angang.

22 Ina minne, nupwen kopwe anneani ekkewe kapas minne ua annuku ngonuk, me angei ekkewe chon pwarata minne ua fen pwonei ngonuk, iwe kopwe eppungano sefan ewe puk, me opano ngeniei, pwe upwe tumunu ekkewe kapas minne kose anneani, tori inet ua ekieki pwe a fich anongonong won ai pwisin mirit ai upwe pwarano mettoch meinisin ngeni ekkewe noun aramas.

23 Pun nengeni, ngang Kot; iwe ngang emon Kot a fori mananam; iwe upwe pwar ngeni ewe fonufan pwe ngang ewe chok nanew, ikenai, me feinfeino chok; iwe use angang me nein ekkewe noun aramas tiwenon chok ika a anongonong won ar nuku.

24 Iwe ewe fansoun epwe feito sefan pwe ewe Samon epwe apasa ngeni i ewe epwe anneani ekkewe kapas minne a kawor ngeni i:

25 Non ukukun an ekkei aramas repwe mareto ngeniei ren awer, me ren tunnawer ra sufonutiei, nge ra esueno netiper towaw seniei, me ar nuokusitiei ra kaeo me ren ekkewe annukun aramas—

26 Iei minne, upwe soposopono ne fori ewe angang mi amwarar me nein ekkei aramas, ewer, ew angang mi amwarar me auchea, pun miritin nour kewe mi mirit me tipachem repwe moreno, me ewe wewen nour kewe mi tipachem repwe monono.

27 Iwe riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra kutta ar repwe opaochueno ar kewe aurour seni ewe Samon! Iwe ar kewe angang a fis non rochopwak; iwe ra apasa: Ion a kuna kich, me ion a sinei kich? Iwe ra pwan apasa: Ennet, om okununatiw mettoch epwe usun murinon an ewe chon for ainipoch puun mi chochon. Nge nengeni, upwe pwar ngeni ir, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas, pwe ngang mi sinei ar kewe angang meinisin. Pun ewe angang epwe apasa usun ewe chon forata i, i ese foriei? Ika ewe mettoch a for epwe apasa usun ewe chon forata i, i ese wor an wewe?

28 Nge nengeni, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas: Upwe pwar ngeni ekkewe noun aramas pwe epwe fokkun ekiseno chok iwe Lebanon epwe winiti ew masies mi uwaoch; me ewe masies mi uwaoch epwene murino usun ew petewen.

29 Iwe non ena ran ewe mi pung seningan epwene rongorong ekkewe kapasen ewe puk, iwe mesen ewe mi chun epwe kuna seni osukosuk me seni rochopwak.

30 Iwe ewe mi tipetekison epwe pisekisekino, iwe ar pwapwa epwe nom non ewe Samon, iwe ewe mi woungaw me nein aramas epwe pwapwa non ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel.

31 Pun ennetin usun ewe Samon mi manau repwe kuna pwe ewe emon mi anoninen ese wor namotan, iwe ewe chon orochongaw a kareno, iwe meinisin ekkewe ra esuku angangangaw ra pokupokuno;

32 Iwe ir ekkewe ra fori emon aramas pwe emon chon atai annuk pokiten ew kapas, me forata ew sar fan iten i ewe a kapung non ewe tit, me akunnano ewe mi pung pokiten ew mettoch ese wor namotan.

33 Iei minne, iei anon ewe Samon, ewe a angasano Abraham, usun ewe imwen Jacob: Jacob esap saw, esap pwan pwecheno won mesan.

34 Nge nupwen i a kuna noun kewe, ewe angangen pei, me nein i, repwe sufonuti itei we, me sufonuti ewe Emon mi Fel noun Jacob, iwe repwe nuokusiti ewe Koten Israel.

35 Ir ekkewe repwe pwan muan non pekin ngun repwe weweoch, me ir ekkewe ra ngunungun repwe kaeo nongonong mi ennet.
2-ne 28:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 28[/font_size][/center]

[i]Chommong mwichefen mi chofona repwe kauuta non ekkewe ranin soponon—Repwe asukuna mettoch mi muan, namotongaw, me nongonong mi puch—Fansoun rochopwak epwe cheewno pokiten ekkewe sense mi chofona—Ewe tefin epwe fori osukosuk non netipen aramas—I epwe asukuna ekkewe nongonong mi chofona. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Iwe iei, nengeni, ami pwi, ua fen kapas ngenikemi, anongonong won an ewe Ngun peseiei; ina minne, ua sinei pwe repwe fokkun fisino.

2 Iwe ekkewe mettoch minne repwe makkeno seni ewe puk epwe napanap auchear ngeni ekkewe noun aramas, iwe akkaewin ngeni mwirimwirich kewe, minne ir nussun ewe imwen Israel.

3 Pun ewe fansoun epwe feito non ena ran pwe ekkewe mwichefen minne ra kauuta, nge esap ngeni ewe Samon, nupwen ewe ew epwe apasa ngeni ewe pwan ew: Nengeni, ngang, ngang an ewe Samon; iwe ekkewe ekkoch repwe apasa: Ngang, ngang an ewe Samon; iwe iei met meinisin repwe apasa ir ekkewe ra aueta ekkewe mwichefen, nge esap ngeni ewe Samon—

4 Iwe repwe anini fengen nefiner; iwe nour kewe pris repwe anini fengen nefiner, iwe repwe assukun ren ar sinei, me amam ewe Ngun mi Fel, ewe a auroura ngenikich met sipwe apasa.

5 Iwe ra amam ewe manamanen Kot, ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel; iwe ra apasa ngeni ekkewe aramas: Ausening ngenikem, me rongorong ngeni am annuk; pun nengeni ese wor Kot ikenai, pun ewe Samon me ewe Chon Angasano a wesino an angang, iwe i a ngeni an manaman ngeni aramas;

6 Nengeni, ausening ami ngeni ai annuk; ika repwe apasa pwe mi wor ew manaman a fisino seni poun ewe Samon, ousap nuku; pun non ei ran i esap emon Kot a fori manaman; i a fen awesano an angang.

7 Ewer, iwe epwe chommong ekkewe repwe apasa: Mwongo, un, me pwapwa, pun nesor sipwene mano; iwe epwe murino ngeni kich.

8 Iwe epwe pwan chommong ekkewe repwe apasa: Mwongo, un, me pwapwa; nge inamo, sufonuti Kot—i epwe epichakono ren om fori ekkoch chok tipis; ewer, ekis chofona, kopwe angei tufich seni emon pokiten an kewe kapas, tueta ew pwang fan iten chon orum; ese wor met mi ngaw ren om fori ei; me fori ekkei mettoch meinisin, pun nesor sipwene mano; iwe ika pwe sia tipis, Kot epwe opunikich ren fite chok wichiwich, iwe nesoponon sipwe manau non ewe muun Kot.

9 Ewer, epwe chommong ekkewe minne repwe assukun non ei sokkun napanap, muan me namotongaw me nongonong mi puch, me repwe nuapas non netiper, me repwe kutta ar repwe opaochueno ar kewe aurour seni ewe Samon; iwe ar kewe angang repwe fis non rochopwak.

10 Iwe chan ekkewe souneng repwe kapaseu seni ewe puun pwe epwe ungeni ir.

11 Ewer, ra fen tawaneno seni ewe aan; ra fen ngaweno.

12 Pokiten namanam tekia, me pokiten ekkewe sense mi chofona, me nongonong mi chofona, ar kewe mwichefen ra fen ngaweno, iwe ar kewe mwichefen ra nuapas; pokiten namanam tekia ra nuapas.

13 Ra sona seni ekkewe mi woungaw pokiten ar kewe imwenipin mi murino; ra sona seni ekkewe mi woungaw pokiten ufer kewe mi murino; iwe ra ariaffou ekkewe mi tipetekison me ekkewe mi woungaw non netiper, pokiten non ar namanam tekia ra nuapas.

14 Ra pwarano uwer mi kum me achifata chamwer; ewer, iwe pokiten ar namanam tekia, me fofforungaw, me angang mi anieput, me nisou, ra fen monucheno tiwenon chok fitemon, ir ra tipetekisonun chon tapweno mwirin Kraist; nge inamo, ra emmwenino, pwe non chommong fansoun ra fori mi muan pokiten ra kaeo me ren ekkewe annukun aramas.

15 O ewe mi mirit, me ewe mi tipachem, me ewe mi pisekisek, ekkewe ra nuapas non namanam tekian netiper, me meinisin ekkewe ra afanafana nongonong mi chofona, me meinisin ekkewe ra fori nisou, me angawano ewe aanen ewe Samon, riaffou, riaffou, riaffou epwe ngeni ir, anon ewe Samon Kot mi Napanap, pun repwe koturutiw ngeni hell!

16 Riaffou ngeni ir ekkewe ra akunnano ekkewe mi pung pokiten ew mettoch ese wor namotan me kapas mi ngaw ngeni ewe minne mi och, me apasa pwe ese wor auchean! Pun ewe ran epwe feito pwe ewe Samon Kot epwe mwitir churi ekkewe aramasen fonufan; iwe non ena ran pwe ra mwukono non angangangaw repwe mano.

17 Nge nengeni, ika ekkewe aramasen ewe fonufan repwe aier seni ar kewe fofforungaw me angang mi anieput resap ninnino, anon ewe Samonun Mwicheichen Aramas.

18 Nge nengeni, ena pochokunen me anieputen mwichefen, ewe fin nisou won unusen ewe fonufan, epwe turuno ngeni ewe puun, iwe epwe fokkun wachimuk an turutiw.

19 Pun ewe muun ewe tefin epwe chechech, iwe ir ekkewe ra choni repwe mwasangeta ar repwe aier, are ewe tefin epwe kamwochuno ir me ren an kewe senimecha feinfeino chok, iwe repwe mwasangeta ar repwe song, me mano non ngun;

20 Pun nengeni, atun ena ran i epwe fori osukosuk non netipen ekkewe noun aramas, me amwasangereta ar repwe song ngeni minne mi och.

21 Iwe ekkoch i epwe chachari, me emichireno ngeni tumunun mochenin fonufan, pwe repwe apasa: Meinisin mi murino non Zion; ewer, Zion a feioch, meinisin mi murino—iwe iei ewe tefin a otupano ngunur, me emmwenireno ekis me ekisitiw ngeni hell.

22 Iwe nengeni, ekkoch i a otupureno, iwe i a ereni ir pwe ese wor hell; me a apasa ngeni ir: Esap ngang emon tefin, pun ese wor emon—iwe iei i a mongunungun non seninger, tori an a kamwochuno ir ren an kewe senimecha mi anoninen, seni ikewe ese wor ngaseno.

23 Ewer, repwe kamwochuno non mano, me hell; me mano, me hell, me ewe tefin, me ir meinisin ekkewe ra fen tupuno seni ir repwe uta me mwen ewe nenien mwottun king an Kot, iwe repwe kapung anongonong won ar kewe angang, seni ikewe repwe feino ngeni ewe neni mi monneta fan iter, pwan mwo ew noomun ekkei me brimstone, minne mi riaffou esemuch.

24 Iei minne, riaffou ngeni i ewe a mefi kinamwe non Zion!

25 Riaffou epwe ngeni i ewe a afanafana: Meinisin mi murino!

26 Ewer, riaffou epwe ngeni i ewe a ausening ngeni ekkewe annukun aramas, me amam ewe manamanen Kot, me ewe niffangen Ngun mi Fel!

27 Ewer, riaffou epwe ngeni i ewe a apasa: Am aua angei, iwe am ause chiwen mochen pwan ekkoch!

28 Iwe amuchunon, riaffou ngeni meinisin ekkewe repwe chechech, me ra song pokiten ewe ennet an Kot! Pun nengeni, i ewe a aueta won ewe fau a etiwa ren pwapwa; iwe i ewe a aueta won ew nongonongen pii a chechech pokiten i epwe turutiw.

29 Riaffou ngeni i ewe a apasa: Am aua angei ewe kapasen Kot, iwe am ause chiwen mochen pwan ekkoch kapasen Kot, pun a naf!

30 Pun nengeni, iei anon ewe Samon Kot: Upwe ngeni ekkewe noun aramas kinikinin kapas won kinikinin kapas, annuk won annuk, iei ekis me pwan ina ekis; iwe ra feioch ir ekkewe ra rongorongoch ngeni ai kewe annuk, me ausening ngeni ai aurour, pun repwe kaeo mirit; pun ren i ewe a angei upwe ngeni i pwan och; me angei seni ir ekkewe ra apasa, A naf met a wor rem, seni ir ewe Samon epwe angeireno pwan mwo ewe minne mi wor rer.

31 A anumamau i ewe a wanong an apinukunuk non aramas, are fori aion pwe poun, are repwe ausening ngeni ekkewe annukun aramas, tiwenon chok ika ar kewe annuk repwe kawor seni ewe manamanen ewe Ngun mi Fel.

32 Riaffou epwe ngeni ekkewe chon Gentile, anon ewe Samon Koten Mwicheichen Aramas! Pun inamo upwe attamau pei ngeni ir seni ran me ran, repwe amam ngang; nge inamo upwe umoumoch ngeni ir, anon ewe Samon Kot, ika repwe aier me feito ngeniei; pun pei a tameu unusen ewe ran, anon ewe Samon Koten Mwicheichen Aramas.
2-ne 29:
[center][font_size=26]Sopun 29[/font_size][/center]

[i]Chommong chon Gentile repwe poutano ewe Puken Mormon—Repwe apasa, Sise chiwen mochen pwan ekkoch Bible—Ewe Samon a kapas ngeni chommong muu—I epwe apungu ewe fonufan seni ekkewe puk minne repwe makkeno. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.[/i]

1 Nge nengeni, epwe chommong ekkoch—atun ena ran nupwen upwe soposopono ne fori ew angang mi amwarar me neir, pwe upwe chechemeni ai kewe pwon mi pin minne ua fori ngeni ekkewe noun aramas, pwe upwe poputa angang sefan atun ewe aruwen fansoun pwe upwe aniwini nei kewe aramas, minne ir chon ewe imwen Israel;

2 Iwe pwan, pwe upwe chechemeni ekkewe pwon minne ua fori ngonuk, Nifai, me pwan ngeni semom kewe, pwe upwe chechemeni mwirimwirum kewe; me pwe ekkewe kapas an mwirimwirum kewe repwe feino seni awei ngeni mwirimwirum kewe; me ai kewe kapas repwe eisiseno ngeni ekkewe nesopun ewe fonufan, pun epwe ew esisin ngeni nei kewe aramas, minne ir chon ewe imwen Israel;

3 Iwe pokiten ai kewe kapas repwe esisino—chommong me nein ekkewe chon Gentile repwe apasa: Ew Bible! Ew Bible! Am aua fen nouni ew Bible, iwe ese tongeni pwan wor ekkoch Bible.

4 Nge iei anon ewe Samon Kot: O ir mi puch, repwe nouni ew Bible; iwe epwe feino seni ekkewe chon Jew, nei kewe aramas pwon chon nom. Iwe met ra ani kinisou ngeni ekkewe chon Jew ren ewe Bible minne ra angei seni ir? Ewer, met ekkewe chon Gentile ra mochen? Ra chechemeni ekkewe riaffou, me ekkewe angang, me ekkewe metekin ekkewe chon Jew, me ar kewe nikitu ngeniei, ren ar awora amanau ngeni ekkewe chon Gentile?
